          <title>
            <string language="en">Convection in gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konvektion in den Gasen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Convection en gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Convection nos gáses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Convezione in gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταφορά στα αέρια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Convección en gases</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram demonstrates the heat transfer and flow processes of air in a room. Warm air goes up while the colder air falls down to takes its place.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cold</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">convection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Wärmeübertragung- und 
Flußprozesse der Luft in einem Raum. Warme Luft geht oben, 
während die Kaltluft unten zum Nehmen sein Platz fällt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme démontre les procédés de transfert
thermique et d'écoulement d'air dans une chambre. L'air chaud 
monte tandis que l'air plus froid tombe vers le bas aux prises son 
endroit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama demonstra os processos de 
transferência e do fluxo de calor do ar em um quarto. O ar 
morno vai acima quando o ar mais frio cair para baixo às tomadas seu 
lugar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema dimostra i processi di scambio di 
calore e di flusso di aria in una stanza. L'aria calda va in su 
mentre l'aria più fredda cade agli introiti il relativo posto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα καταδεικνύει τις διαδικασίες 
μεταφοράς θερμότητας και ροής του αέρα σε ένα δωμάτιο. Ο 
θερμός αέρας ανεβαίνει ενώ ο πιό κρύος αέρας πέφτει κάτω 
παίρνει τη θέση του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama demuestra los procesos del traspaso 
térmico y del flujo del aire en un cuarto. El aire caliente va 
para arriba mientras que el aire más frío cae abajo a las tomas su 
lugar.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wärmeübertragung</string>
          </keyword>
